price: Akasema (Nuhu): Mola wangu Mlezi! Ninusuru kwa kuwa wamenikanusha.
footnotes: Nuhu akamwomba Mola wake Mlezi baada ya kukata tamaa kuamini kwao, akasema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Ninusuru nao, na watie adabu kwa sababu ya kuukadhibisha kwao wito wangu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
